speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mrs Aubert, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the implementation of the EU action plan against illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing [ 2006/2225(INI) ] ( A6-0015/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mrs Aubert, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the implementation of the EU action plan against illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing [ 2006/2225(INI) ] ( A6-0015/2007 ).
